defaultStrategy.description: Always create a new merge commit and update the target branch to it, even if the source branch is already up to date with the target branch.
defaultStrategy.name: Merge commit

strategies.description: Always create a new merge commit and update the target branch to it, even if the source branch is already up to date with the target branch.
strategies.name: Merge commit

strategies.description: If the source branch is out of date with the target branch, create a merge commit. Otherwise, update the target branch to the latest commit on the source branch.
strategies.name: Fast-forward

strategies.description: If the source branch is out of date with the target branch, reject the merge request. Otherwise, update the target branch to the latest commit on the source branch.
strategies.name: Fast-forward only

strategies.description: Combine all commits into one new non-merge commit on the target branch.
strategies.name: Squash

strategies.description: If the source branch is out of date with the target branch, reject the merge request. Otherwise, combine all commits into one new non-merge commit on the target branch.
strategies.name: Squash, fast-forward only
